pages.text:
$(italic)Unlike the primitive Crafting Table, crafting in the $(l:general/pedestal)Pigment Pedestal$(/l) takes some time.
You found that the time these crafting processes took increased steadily with the complexity of the components.$(br)This focus should help you bring the crafting times back to acceptable levels. It helps the Pigment Pedestal collect the energy focused by the structure.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Place the Pedestal Accelerator on top one of the four gemstone blocks close to your $(l:general/pedestal)Pigment Pedestal$(/l).$(br)They also work for the $(l:general/fusion_shrine)Fusion Shrine$(/l), when placed on one of the chiseled blocks.$(br2)Each additional Accelerator has an increased effect.

pages.title: Tier 2
pages.text: The Pedestal Accellerator T2 improves all aspects of the previous variant. Making your crafting even more rapid.

pages.title: Tier 3
pages.text: Tier 3 leaves nothing to be desired - at least in terms of crafting speed.
